page.title: 02Shops and Amenities.
page.content: In Threemilestone there are eight different shops. Four of the shops are selling "off-licenced" beer and frozen foods,fruit,drinks,toys,newspapers and ice-cream.{The Butcher's }shop sells meat,frozen foods,cream,milk and butter. There is a {Hair-dresser who cuts and perms hair. They set your hair and style it. There is a {Garage }that sells {Volkswagon}and {Audi}cars.{The Hardware shop}sells gardening equipment, snooker tables, bike locks, toys, wood, video tapes, Rabbit food and tools. There is a {Community Centre }that has{Judo}on Saturdays, on Tuesday and Friday there is a{Play school. }There is a {Church that holds Cubs, Brownies and Girl Guides. There is a Fish and Chip Shop and a Doctor and Dentist Surgery. There is going to be a Building Society in a new shop.
